short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Look Extension for Axon searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Axon Quick Look search utility is a browser extension that makes it easy to find objects across all facets in Axon without opening the Axon web page. The extension searches every item in Axon for a match. You can also select keywords from other web pages, and use a hotkey to perform a search in the Axon Quick Look browser extension. You can use the extension to search for public objects in Axon even if you have not logged in or if you do not have a user account.
